titleStmt.title: Master John Goodwins quere's questioned, concerning the power of the civil magistrate in matters of religion: by one quere opposed to his thirty. Quere, whether the fourth commandment doth not sufficiently justifie and injoin the power of the civil magistrate in matters of religion.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Tho. Vnderhill, at the Anchor and Bible in Pauls Church-yard.,

notesStmt.note: A reply to: Goodwin, John. Thirty queries.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
